tests.explanation: The original program correctly increments the date by one day, while the mutant program increments it by an incorrect amount resulting in a different date.
The original program correctly decrements the time by two hours, while the mutant program decrements by an incorrect amount and results in a different date.
The original program correctly increments the date by one week and two days, while the mutant program increments it by an incorrect amount resulting in a different date.
